headline: Internet of Vehicles (IoV) Report 2025 | Industry to Experience 21.4% CAGR During 2025-2034 | Leading Players are Google, NXP Semiconductors, Intel, Texas Instruments, IBM
summary: The Internet of Vehicles market, driven by IoT and technological advancements, unlocks opportunities in autonomous driving, safety-enhanced vehicles, predictive maintenance, and enriched infotainment. headline: Do Texas Instruments' (TXN) Order Fluctuations Reveal Deeper Shifts in Automotive Strategy?
summary: Texas Instruments recently reported that demand cooled following an April surge tied to customers placing orders ahead of the 'Liberation Day' tariff announcement, while recovery remains uneven across its key end markets. An important takeaway is that the company emphasized automotive demand is still lagging due to economic uncertainty, highlighting persistent industry-specific headwinds despite signs of overall recovery. We'll review how these demand signals, especially in automotive, could...
